data.text: And the award for "Most Creative Gingerbread House" goes to... https://t.co/F6riUHTHsP

Sometimes the best way to get the job done is not by going big, but by going small - really, really small. Allegiant's antimicrobial protectant forms a microscopic layer of tiny ridges on all surfaces that pierce the cell wall of germs, instantly destroying them on contact. https://t.co/rskJRHtlqZ

Meet Mario, who is graduating today with a degree in Air Transportation Management. Happy Graduation Day, Mario! Here's to challenging the notion of the sky being the limit and, instead, working hard to make it your office.

📸: @phxazspotter https://t.co/Xt0ow1WKuT
Heads or tails? Who else is ready for game day at @AllegiantStadm?! https://t.co/iVsfUc4u7O

This holiday season, our team members have been lending a hand at MANNA FoodBank. Serving people in 16 counties of North Carolina, MANNA moves more than 50,000 lbs. of food each day. Good people doing good things makes all the difference in our communities! #TogetherWeFly https://t.co/bq5WOua04k
It started with "Elf on a Shelf," but what about "bling on a wing"? 🤣🤣 #JustASuggestion https://t.co/pIWPhu0TQu

#BigTen Champions Week just got even better. We're excited to be teaming up with @theDlasvegas and @stadiumswim at @CircaLasVegas to bring watching your favorite teams to a whole new level of incredible! https://t.co/WiJxipoIRi
RT @DerekJStevens: Thx @Allegiant for including @theDlasvegas & @stadiumswim in your flight promotion for #BigTen Championship Week. Really…

data.text: We earned the highest score for COVID-19 traveler safety in a recent ranking of North America's airlines! data.text: What's the best way to learn about aerodynamics? Paper airplanes, of course! Each year, we team up with @BGCSNV for Paper Plane Palooza to inspire and empower the next generation of aviation professionals. We had so much fun at @LASairport last year. #TBT https://t.co/C3hqP7IeCg

Inside our cabins, air flows downward from vents near the ceiling and exits near your feet. Air doesn't flow toward the front or back of the aircraft. You can further increase the airflow by opening the personal vent above your seat! https://t.co/ru8DIQLs0M

Travel decisions require flexibility now more than ever. That's why we've extended our no-fee change/cancellation policy to cover itineraries purchased on or before September 1, 2020.

Last week, we introduced you to a little spotted fellow who lost his family. Today, we flew Masch-Masch home and reunited him with his 6 year-old owner, Jaydence.
